label: 梵字悉曇字母并釈義
ローマ字1: Bonji shittan jimo narabi ni shakugi
対訳語: Essential Characters of the Sanskrit Siddham Script and Their Interpretations
本: The Weaving of Mantra:  Kūkai and the Construction of Esoteric Buddhist Discourse . Columbia University Press . 1999
見出し読み: ぼんじしったんじもならびにしゃくぎ
説明文: [Kūkai's work, in which he] identifies the meaning" of the twelve essential vowels and thirty-five principal consonants (p. 291). [空海]"
